text: Faroe Islands competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Faroe Islands entered three swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Alvi Hjelm |align=left|200 m individual medley |2:07.91 |42 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|400 m individual medley |4:33.28 |35 |colspan=2 |colspan=2|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Oil Mortensen |align=left|800 m freestyle |8:24.02 |36 |colspan=2 |colspan=2|Did not advance |- |align=left|1500 m freestyle |16:17.71 |34 |colspan=2 |colspan=2|Did not advance |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Signhild Joensen |align=left|100 m backstroke |1:04.04 |44 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|200 m backstroke |2:17.30 |34 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Faroe Islands at the World Aquatics Championships Category:2019 in Faroese sport
title: Faroe Islands at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
